00031 class KVIRC_API KviBasicIrcServerInfo
00032 {
00033 protected:
00034         QString m_szServerVersion;
00035 public:
00036         KviBasicIrcServerInfo(const QString & version = KviQString::Empty);
00037         virtual ~KviBasicIrcServerInfo();
00038 protected:
00039         virtual const QString & getCustomChannelModeDescription(QChar) { return KviQString::Empty; };
00040         virtual const QString & getCustomUserModeDescription(QChar) { return KviQString::Empty; };
00041 private:
00042         const QString & getBasicChannelModeDescription(QChar mode);
00043         const QString & getBasicUserModeDescription(QChar mode);
00044 public:
00045         const QString & getChannelModeDescription(QChar mode);
00046         const QString & getUserModeDescription(QChar mode);
00047         virtual char getRegisterModeChar() { return 0; };
00048 };

00074 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionServerInfo
00075 {
00076         friend class KviConsole; // for now
00077         friend class KviServerParser;
00078         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00079 protected:
00080         KviIrcConnectionServerInfo();
00081         ~KviIrcConnectionServerInfo();
00082 private:
00083         KviBasicIrcServerInfo * m_pServInfo;
00084         QString m_szName;                      // the most actual server name (may be the one we specify or the one that the server wants to be known as)
00085         QString m_szSupportedUserModes;        // the supported user modes
00086         QString m_szSupportedChannelModes;     // the supported channel modes
00087         QString m_szSupportedModePrefixes;     // the actually used mode prefixes  @+
00088         kvi_u32_t * m_pModePrefixTable;        // the mode prefixes above in a table
00089         unsigned int m_uPrefixes;
00090         QString m_szSupportedModeFlags;        // the actually used mode flags     ov
00091         QString m_szSupportedChannelTypes;     // the supported channel types
00092         bool m_bSupportsModesIe;               // supports the channel modes I and e ?
00093         bool m_bSupportsWatchList;             // supports the watch list ?
00094         bool m_bSupportsCodePages;             // supports the /CODEPAGE command ?
00095         int m_iMaxTopicLen;
00096         int m_iMaxModeChanges;
00097         QString m_szListModes;
00098         QString m_szPlainModes;
00099 public:
00100         char  registerModeChar() { return m_pServInfo ?  m_pServInfo->getRegisterModeChar() : 0; };
00101         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00102         const QString & supportedUserModes(){ return m_szSupportedUserModes; };
00103         const QString & supportedChannelModes(){ return m_szSupportedChannelModes; };
00104         const QString & supportedChannelTypes(){ return m_szSupportedChannelTypes; };

00106         const QString & supportedModeFlags(){ return m_szSupportedModeFlags; };

00110         bool supportsWatchList(){ return m_bSupportsWatchList; };
00111         bool supportsCodePages(){ return m_bSupportsCodePages; };

00113         int maxTopicLen() { return m_iMaxTopicLen; };
00114         int maxModeChanges() { return m_iMaxModeChanges; };

00118         const QString & getChannelModeDescription(QChar mode) { return m_pServInfo->getChannelModeDescription(mode); };
00119         const QString & getUserModeDescription(QChar mode) { return m_pServInfo->getUserModeDescription(mode); };
